trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Charix, the Raging Isle
trans-unit.target: 岛身怒怪凯立茨

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spells your opponents cast that target Charix, the Raging Isle cost {2} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 对手施放之以岛身怒怪凯立茨为目标的咒语增加{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}: Charix gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Islands you control.
trans-unit.target: {3}：凯立茨得+X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的海岛数量。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zendikar's seas are deeper than anyone can fathom.
trans-unit.target: 赞迪卡的海洋深到无人能勘测。

trans-unit.source: Chilling Trap
trans-unit.target: 冰寒陷阱

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。如果你操控法术师，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Serves you right for rushing ahead."\n—Kaliea, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「叫你往前冲，活该。」 ～海户探陷人卡理耶

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·51 | Cleric of Chill Depths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cleric of Chill Depths
trans-unit.target: 寒渊僧侣

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·51 | Cleric of Chill Depths | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Cleric of Chill Depths blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 每当寒渊僧侣阻挡一个生物时，该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·51 | Cleric of Chill Depths | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Before my people turned to false gods, we built a glittering city beneath the northern sea ice. The magic of ancient Benthidrix lives in me!"
trans-unit.target: 「早在族人转而信奉伪神之前，我们就已在北洋冰面下造就一座金光之城。远古深洋殿的魔力与我同存！」

trans-unit.source: Concerted Defense
trans-unit.target: 协力防御

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1} plus an additional {1} for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: 除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{1}，并为你冒险团中的每个生物各支付{1}，否则反击之。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.source: "You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!"
trans-unit.target: 「惹到其中一个，便是惹到所有人！」

trans-unit.source: Confounding Conundrum
trans-unit.target: 混乱谜团

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·53 | Confounding Conundrum | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Confounding Conundrum enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当混乱谜团进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·53 | Confounding Conundrum | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, they return a land they control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地在任一对手的操控下进战场时，若该牌手本回合中有另一个地在其操控下进战场，则他将一个由他操控的地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Coralhelm Chronicler
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚盔年代史家

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·54 | Coralhelm Chronicler | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·54 | Coralhelm Chronicler | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Coralhelm Chronicler enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a card with a kicker ability from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当珊瑚盔年代史家进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中一张具任一增幅异能的牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Cunning Geysermage
trans-unit.target: 狡黠热泉法师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·55 | Cunning Geysermage | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·55 | Cunning Geysermage | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Cunning Geysermage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当狡黠热泉法师进战场时，若它已增幅，则将至多另一个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Come on, Skitch, we'll lose them in the geyserfield."
trans-unit.target: 「快点，阿蜥，到了热泉原就能甩掉他们了。」

trans-unit.source: Deliberate
trans-unit.target: 深思熟虑

trans-unit.source: Scry 2, then draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I can't see all that the future holds, but I can keep us one step ahead of death."
trans-unit.target: 「我虽不能看透未来的一切，但能让我们避开死亡一步。」

trans-unit.source: Expedition Diviner
trans-unit.target: 探险队占卜师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·57 | Expedition Diviner | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·57 | Expedition Diviner | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as you control another Wizard, Expedition Diviner has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控另一个法术师，探险队占卜师便具有「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: Wizards' spells twist the fabric of reality to channel elemental energies, peer into the future, and even calm the Roil.
trans-unit.target: 法师咒语能够扭曲现实束缕，从而通联元素能量、窥见未来世界，甚或平息暴怒狂搅。

trans-unit.source: Field Research
trans-unit.target: 实地勘验

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·58 | Field Research | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·58 | Field Research | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. If this spell was kicked, draw three cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "In the field, speed-reading is a survival skill."
trans-unit.target: 「到了实地，读得快才能保住命。」

trans-unit.source: Glacial Grasp
trans-unit.target: 冰冻攫

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·59 | Glacial Grasp | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap target creature. Its controller mills two cards. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。其操控者磨两张牌。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。（他将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·59 | Glacial Grasp | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Glasspool Mimic
trans-unit.target: 璃池拟态妖

trans-unit.source: You may have Glasspool Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control, except it's a Shapeshifter Rogue in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使璃池拟态妖当成任一由你操控的生物之复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有「变形兽／浪客」此两个类别。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "When I touched the Glasspool, I tasted infinite possibility."\n—Ashen Wal, Akoum Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「我手刚触碰璃池水面，便尝到了无尽可能。」 ～阿库姆探险队的爱森瓦

trans-unit.source: Glasspool Shore
trans-unit.target: 璃池湖岸

trans-unit.source: Glasspool Shore enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: 璃池湖岸须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 浪客 {2}{U}

trans-unit.source: "Past and possibility come together in the vastness of infinite reflection."\n—Ashen Wal, Akoum Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「在广阔湖面倒影中，过往视像与未来愿景融为一体。」 ～阿库姆探险队的爱森瓦

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inscription of Insight
trans-unit.target: 预言铭文

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U}{U}

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为选择任意数量的选项。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: •将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Scry 2, then draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: •占卜2，然后抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Text: Paragraph 5
trans-unit.source: • Target player creates an X/X blue Illusion creature token, where X is the number of cards in their hand.
trans-unit.target: •目标牌手派出一个X/X蓝色虚影衍生生物，X为其手牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Into the Roil
trans-unit.target: 没入狂搅

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{U}。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果此咒语已增幅，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In theory, the death of the Eldrazi should have stilled the Roil. It did not.
trans-unit.target: 理论上，奥札奇灭亡应能平息狂搅。实际上没有。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Mirror Mage
trans-unit.target: 镜像法师杰斯

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Jace, Mirror Mage enters the battlefield, if Jace was kicked, create a token that's a copy of Jace, Mirror Mage, except it's not legendary and its starting loyalty is 1.
trans-unit.target: 当镜像法师杰斯进战场时，若杰斯已增幅，则派出一个为镜像法师杰斯之复制品的衍生物，但它不是传奇，且起始忠诚为1。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Text: Paragraph 3
ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [0]: Draw a card and reveal it. Remove a number of loyalty counters equal to that card's mana value from Jace, Mirror Mage.
trans-unit.target: 0：抓一张牌并展示之。从镜像法师杰斯上移去若干忠诚指示物，其数量等同于该牌的总法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Jwari Disruption
trans-unit.target: 爪尔干扰

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "You worry too much."\n—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「你担心得太多了。」 ～海户探陷人尼斯达

trans-unit.source: Jwari Ruins
trans-unit.target: 爪尔遗迹

trans-unit.source: Jwari Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: 爪尔遗迹须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 瞬间 {1}{U}

trans-unit.source: "The Ondu Skyclave was a center for rebellion against the capital in Makindi. Of course they built in deadly traps."\n—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「当初马钦迪境内爆发针对都城的反抗斗争时，昂度空境便是争夺焦点。其中当然布有各式致命陷阱。」 ～海户探陷人尼斯达

trans-unit.source: Living Tempest
trans-unit.target: 生体风暴

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·65 | Living Tempest | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·65 | Living Tempest | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "If you don't like the weather, just wait a few minutes and it'll change ... probably for the worse."\n—Amandi, kitesail expert
trans-unit.target: 「你要是不喜欢这天气，只需等几分钟它就会变天. . .但多半是越变越差。」 ～航筝专家阿曼迪

trans-unit.source: Lullmage's Domination
trans-unit.target: 息法师的支配

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·66 | Lullmage's Domination | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature whose controller has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 如果为此咒语目标的生物之操控者坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，则此咒语减少{3}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·66 | Lullmage's Domination | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature with mana value X.
trans-unit.target: 获得目标总法术力费用为X的生物之操控权。

trans-unit.source: "One spell to quiet the Roil, one to quash the will. The principle is the same."
trans-unit.target: 「一个咒语平息狂搅，另外一个击碎意志。两者原理相通。」

trans-unit.source: Maddening Cacophony
trans-unit.target: 致狂杂音

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·67 | Maddening Cacophony | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {3}{U}

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·67 | Maddening Cacophony | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each opponent mills eight cards. If this spell was kicked, instead each opponent mills half their library, rounded up.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各磨八张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为每位对手各磨其牌库一半数量的牌，小数点后进位。

trans-unit.source: Jace traced Nahiri to the Singing City, but the magic of the ancient ruins threatened to overwhelm his mind.
trans-unit.target: 杰斯一路跟随娜希丽来到魅歌城，但这处远古遗迹的魔法却试图压垮他的心智。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·68 | Master of Winds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of Winds
trans-unit.target: 风幻大师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·68 | Master of Winds | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·68 | Master of Winds | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Master of Winds enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 当风幻大师进战场时，抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·68 | Master of Winds | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, you may have Master of Winds's base power and toughness become 4/1 or 1/4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间，法术或法术师咒语时，你可以使风幻大师的基础力量与防御力成为4/1或1/4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Falconer
trans-unit.target: 驯隼人鱼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·69 | Merfolk Falconer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·69 | Merfolk Falconer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，占卜2。

trans-unit.source: "For generations, we have bred and trained falcons for expeditions into Emeria. Now more sky ruins open themselves to those with the means to reach the heights!"
trans-unit.target: 「数个世代之前，我们为了深入伊美黎探险，便早已开始繁育和训练猎隼。如今随着更多天空遗迹现身世间，唯有自由翱翔天空的族群才能在其间自由穿行。」

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Windrobber
trans-unit.target: 劫风人鱼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·70 | Merfolk Windrobber | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·70 | Merfolk Windrobber | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Merfolk Windrobber deals combat damage to a player, that player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当劫风人鱼对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手磨一张牌。（他将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·70 | Merfolk Windrobber | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Merfolk Windrobber: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲劫风人鱼：抓一张牌。只能于任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌时起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "The ancient kor were a clever bunch with a taste for nasty traps. Spikes, poison, fire pouring forth with no warning . . . I've seen and disabled them all. If you intend to raid a Skyclave, you'd be wise to hire me on."
trans-unit.target: 「古代寇族头脑机敏，偏好摆弄凶险陷阱。出钉子的、涂剧毒的、突然喷火的. . .这些都被我一一看穿并全数解除。如果你想要去空境探险，带上我才是明智之举。」

trans-unit.source: Nimble Trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 矫捷探陷人

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·72 | Nimble Trapfinder | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nimble Trapfinder can't be blocked if you had another Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard enter the battlefield under your control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 如果本回合中有另一个僧侣，浪客，战士或法术师在你的操控下进战场，则矫捷探陷人不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·72 | Nimble Trapfinder | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card" until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你的冒险团满编，则由你操控的生物获得「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌」直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Risen Riptide
trans-unit.target: 醒转浪涛

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, Risen Riptide has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，醒转浪涛的基础力量与防御力为5/5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Most days the sea is my friend. But only most days."\n—Jori En, expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「大多数日子里，大海都是我的朋友。但也只有大多数日子里是这样。」 ～探险队长裘黎恩

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·74 | Roost of Drakes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Roost of Drakes
trans-unit.target: 龙兽宿巢

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·74 | Roost of Drakes | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·74 | Roost of Drakes | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Roost of Drakes enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 当龙兽宿巢进战场时，若它已增幅，则派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·74 | Roost of Drakes | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Ruin Crab
trans-unit.target: 遗迹蟹

trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

trans-unit.source: A new dawn, a new adventure.
trans-unit.target: 新的一天，新的冒险。

trans-unit.source: Branchloft Pathway
trans-unit.target: 枝阁通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.
"Not for the bumble-footed nor wobble-stomached."\n—Kreq of Sunder Bay
trans-unit.target: 「手脚不利落、肚量特别大的走不了。」 ～裂船湾的奎嘎

trans-unit.source: Boulderloft Pathway
trans-unit.target: 石阁通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}.
"The path is stable. It's the gusts all around it that are a bit 'whoosh—oops—bye.'"\n—Kreq of Sunder Bay
trans-unit.target: 「道路本身很平稳。「路本身是很稳。但只要周围突然起风，可能就会听到『飕飕～糟糕～再见』。」 ～裂船湾的奎嘎

trans-unit.source: Brightclimb Pathway
trans-unit.target: 明攀通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W}.
"Why risk life and limb exploring the wilds? For this."\n—Yavotz, Sea Gate Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「你问为什么要冒着失去生命、断手断脚的危险探索野外？就是为了这个。」 ～海户探险队的耶悟茨

trans-unit.source: Grimclimb Pathway
trans-unit.target: 暗攀通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B}.
"My mother wanted me to take over the family dry goods business, but no. I had to come here."\n—Yavotz, Sea Gate Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「母亲想让我接手家族的织品杂货生意，但我拒绝了。 我必须来这里一趟。」 ～海户探险队的耶悟茨

trans-unit.source: Clearwater Pathway
trans-unit.target: 净水通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U}.
"Just when the river seems most peaceful, suddenly you round a bend and hurtle down a waterfall."\n—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「就在河流水势看来最平缓的地方，你忽然之间就会被吸进急流，掉入瀑布。」 ～哈利玛探险队长萨格达

trans-unit.source: Murkwater Pathway
trans-unit.target: 浊水通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B}.
"Here, at least, the danger is usually in plain sight."\n—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「而这里，至少你一眼就能看到危险所在。」 ～哈利玛探险队长萨格达

trans-unit.source: Cragcrown Pathway
trans-unit.target: 岩冠通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}.
"The greatest danger on the path is a failure of nerve."\n—Enwor, Sea Gate Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「一路上最大的危险就是突然丧失勇气。」 ～海户探险队的恩沃

trans-unit.source: Timbercrown Pathway
trans-unit.target: 丛冠通路

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.

trans-unit.target: 「快速通过，不要理会底下的嚎叫声。」 ～海户探险队的恩沃

trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果此咒语已增幅，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·387 | Into the Roil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In theory, the death of the Eldrazi should have stilled the Roil. It did not.
trans-unit.target: 理论上，奥札奇灭亡应能平息狂搅。实际上没有。

trans-unit.source: Bloodchief's Thirst
trans-unit.target: 血侯饥渴

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·388 | Bloodchief's Thirst | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·388 | Bloodchief's Thirst | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, instead destroy target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标总法术力费用等于或小于2的生物或鹏洛客。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "We are free. It is our duty to live well."
trans-unit.target: 「我们已得解放。因此有义务好好活下去。」

trans-unit.source: Roil Eruption
trans-unit.target: 狂搅爆发

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·389 | Roil Eruption | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{5}

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·389 | Roil Eruption | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Roil Eruption deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage instead.
trans-unit.target: 狂搅爆发对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为它造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Our feeble villages and tiny encampments stand only at the whim of the Roil."\n—*The Invokers' Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「我们的孱弱村庄和渺小营地能否存留，端看狂搅脸色。」 ～*《召现师传说》*

trans-unit.source: Roiling Regrowth
trans-unit.target: 狂搅滋芽

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个地。从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Roots find their way through rock, and even mountains must give way to new growth."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「树根会想方设法穿过石块，就连高山也得给新苗让路。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.source: Kargan Warleader
trans-unit.target: 卡加战领

trans-unit.source: Other Warriors you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他战士得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: From rebellion against the Akoum Skyclave to fighting the Eldrazi titans, the dragon-riding Kargan tribes have never missed an opportunity to defy the odds.
trans-unit.target: 从反抗阿库姆空境到对抗奥扎奇巨怪，生活在龙背上的卡加部落从未缺席挑战不利局面的机会。
